headline: NEWPORT UNIVERSAL FIBER OPTIC DETECTOR
keywords: damp rods jacks rods mirror holders mounts plates posts gimble lens mount rail carrier adpter clamp base bracket diaphrams carriers
specstable:
Manufacturer Newport
Model 818-IS-1
Type Fiber Optic Detector, Universal
Other Information

Spectral range: 400-1650nm
Saturation power: >200mW
Response time: Power average w/Attenuator: .25W(bare fiber, 1W(connectorized)
Pulse energy, max: 100uJ
Accuracy: ±2.5%
Responsivity:

  • >0.0025 A/W (400-600nm)
  • >0.0040 A/W (610-1650 nm)
    Rise time: greater than or equal to 2us
    Shunt resistance: greater than or equal to 20 Mohm
    Die capacitance: 800 max. pF
    Material: InGaAs/Si
Condition Very Good
